location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the confirmed report that the Sallyhas been taken by the Chaub [Banu Kaâ€˜b] and new reports that the Fort Williamhas been taken too. Whether to take action is discussed, as well as what ships are available for this purpose.
